item.title: Jimmy Kimmel Blatantly Broke FCC Rules And Brendan Carr Was Right To Notice
item.description: Kimmel lied to his audience when he blamed the murder on the 'MAGA gang,' violating FCC regulations that prohibit news distortion or a hoax.

item.title: Stop Asking Me To ‘Unify’ With The Violent Left
item.description: There can be no unity between good and evil. Somebody has to win this thing.

item.title: Can We Finally Admit The T In LGBT Stands For Terrorism?
item.description: The perpetrators of these heinous tragedies and those who cheer them on couldn't be any clearer as to what their motivation is or who their targets ar...

item.title: FBI Sources Alleged Biden Stopped Burisma Investigation ‘To Protect The Interests Of Hunter,’ New Docs Show
item.description: The outrageous connections described in these newly released documents scream to be fully explained to the American people.

item.title: ABC News’ Matt Gutman Fabricates Quote To Make Alleged Kirk Assassin Look More ‘Touching,’ ‘Human’
item.description: The correspondent attributed a fabricated quote, ‘I want to protect you, my love,’ to soften the case against the reported assassin.
